code: export var GET_ERRORS="GET_ERRORS";export var CLEAR_ERRORS="CLEAR_ERRORS";export var GET_SUCCESS="GET_SUCCESS";export var CLEAR_SUCCESS="CLEAR_SUCCESS";var initialState={successMessage:{message:null,status:null,id:null},errorsMessage:{message:null,status:null,id:null}};var SuccessErrorReducer=function SuccessErrorReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_ERRORS:{return{errorsMessage:{message:action.payload.message,status:action.payload.status,id:action.payload.id}};}case GET_SUCCESS:{return{successMessage:{message:action.payload.message,status:action.payload.status,id:action.payload.id}};}case CLEAR_ERRORS:{return initialState;}case CLEAR_SUCCESS:{return initialState;}default:return state;}};export var clearErrors=function clearErrors(){return{type:CLEAR_ERRORS};};export var clearSuccess=function clearSuccess(){return{type:CLEAR_SUCCESS};};export var returnErrors=function returnErrors(message,status){var id=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:null;return{type:GET_ERRORS,payload:{message:message,status:status,id:id}};};export var returnSuccess=function returnSuccess(message,status){var id=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:null;return{type:GET_SUCCESS,payload:{message:message,status:status,id:id}};};export default SuccessErrorReducer;
